title: Science Leadership Competency Enhancement Program through Video-Based Authentic Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Scenario-based learning design for corporate science managers/leaders, simulating real work environments

learning_goals: Problems occurring in actual science experiments and research settings can be analyzed through video case studies, with three or more solution strategies proposed
Collaborate with team members/peers to design and execute practical problem-solving processes through video-based case studies
Use video feedback tools to self-evaluate project implementation and establish professional development plans
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
